text: Nangnichu ningpa Seitan makheiya ning eii, khat-um ningpa imanuom kha nangni-um ningthozoot. Inphutna makheiya ama chu mi kathat eii khat-um akadik khan supngir ngirmak, ajarchu amadiang akadik kha ommak. Ma'n maleisei aril kaalkhan, a-ngaiya ama diangnga kaomkha iril eii, ajarchu maleiseipa eii khat-um maleisei rakipngai pa eii.
